info.description: RESTful API for the Denner Wineshop
info.title: Denner Shop Web Service

get.summary: List all wines currently targetted for the Wineshop
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all wines targetted for the Wineshop.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filters: JSON array of Filter object, urlencoded.

Filter object:
- property: Property to filter on.
- operator: Operation property. Enumeration ('eq', 'like', 'lt', 'gt', 'in', ...). Dependent from property (not all might be allowed).
- type: Type of value. Enumeration ('string', 'integer', 'boolean', 'array') Dependent from property and operator (not all might be allowed).
- value: Value. Must be of the defined type.

Examples:
- [{"property":"id","operator":"in","type":"array","value":["7627150d-36bd-4867-89b2-091800a03d24","58afec5c-ece9-4b66-bc55-00d6dc1b65b8"]}]
- [{"property":"in_shop","operator":"eq","type":"boolean","value":true}]

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the results, e.g. "sort=[{"property":"name","direction":"desc"}]" will sort by name (Z to A)

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
The page size. Default: 10
To disable pagination (when supported) send "-1".

character.value: Dunkles Rubinrot. In der Nase Aromen von roten Beeren, reifen Kirschen und Brombeeren. Geschmeidig im Gaumen.
Robe rubis foncé. Nez de baies rouges, de cerises matures et de mûres. Bouche moelleuse.
Rosso rubino scuro. Al naso aromi di bacche rosse, ciliege mature e more. Morbido al palato.

medals_text.value: 91 Punkte Wine Spectator (2016), 83-85 Punkte Antonio Galloni (2016), Grosses Golddiplom Expovina (2016), Winery of the Year (2016)
91 points Wine Spectator (2016), 83-85 points Antonio Galloni (2016), Grand diplôme d’Or Expovina (2016), Winery of the Year (2016)
91 punti Wine Spectator (2016), 83-85 punti Antonio Galloni (2016), Grande Diploma d'oro Expovina (2016), Winery of the Year (2016)

description.value: Es liegt in der Tradition der Familie Weinmacher, hervorragende Weine in Eichenfässern zu produzieren. ...

title.value: Mandorla Primitivo di Puglia IGT 6 x 75 cl
Mandorla Primitivo di Puglia IGT 6 x 75 cl
Mandorla Primitivo di Puglia IGT 6 x 75 cl

get.summary: List the appraisals of given wine
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all appraisals (Bewertungen) for a specific wine.

parameters.name: article_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an article

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
The page size. Default: 10
To disable pagination (when supported) send "-1".

appraisals.title: un très très bon vin
appraisals.description: mais ce n'est pas du zinfandel !! c'est du PRIMITIVO !! le cépage ORIGINAL !!! Denner, qu'est ce qui vous arrive ???

post.summary: Create a new appraisal for the given wine
post.description: Use this operation to create a new appraisal (Bewertung) for a specific wine.

parameters.name: article_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an article

post.description: Use this operation to create a new vote for a specific appraisal.

parameters.name: article_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an article

parameters.name: appraisal_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an appraisal

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all wine characteristics (Wein-Geschmacksprofil).
Use this operation to get a list of all wine growers (Winzer).

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filters: JSON array of Filter object, urlencoded.

Filter object:
- property: Property to filter on.
- operator: Operation property. Enumeration ('eq', 'like', 'lt', 'gt', 'in', ...). Dependent from property (not all might be allowed).
- type: Type of value. Enumeration ('string', 'integer', 'boolean', 'array') Dependent from property and operator (not all might be allowed).
- value: Value. Must be of the defined type.

Examples:
- [{"property":"id","operator":"in","type":"array","value":["7627150d-36bd-4867-89b2-091800a03d24","58afec5c-ece9-4b66-bc55-00d6dc1b65b8"]}]
- [{"property":"in_shop","operator":"eq","type":"boolean","value":true}]

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the results, e.g. "sort=[{"property":"name","direction":"desc"}]" will sort by name (Z to A)

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
The page size. Default: 10
To disable pagination (when supported) send "-1".

parameters.description: Sort the results, e.g. "sort=name__desc" will sort by name (Z to A)

post.description: Use this operation to create a sweepstake participant (Gewinnspielteilnehmer).

name.description: German name for the eco label

score.description: Given score (0 = no match; 1 = slight match; 2 = good match; 3 = very good match; 4 = perfect match)

value.description: Given value (-2 = not at all; -1 = not much; 0 = neutral; 1 = has some; 2 = full characteristic)

for_sale.description: Is the wine for sale (can it be bought)?

compared.description: Is the wine's instead price compared externally (Konkurrenzvergleich)?

value.description: Navision stock count, might be negative
Barcode text value (pattern according to type)

allow_featuring.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be featured (i.e. displayed on front/main/home page)?

allow_promotion.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be promoted (i.e. displayed on a promotional page)?

allow_background.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be displayed with a background (i.e. displayed on a page with a deceptive/trivializing background)?

shop_user_id.description: Identifier for the person's Wineshop user account
